transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir ye Ultra Power Control company mein baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Good morning sir, main Vishal baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se recorded line se sir kaise hain?
Executive: Hmm, badhiya.
Executive: Aapko service ke liye maine connect kiya hai sir, IndiaMART pe account hai.
Customer: Mere ko sir, mere ko service nahi chahiye. Already sab hua hai. Mere ko refund chahiye aur kuch nahi chahiye sir.
Executive: Refund? Sir but aapka IndiaMART pe sir purana account hai.
Customer: Mere ko kuch nahi, mere ko purana churana jhund bhi hai sir wo chhodo. Vishal ji meri baat suniye, aapke paas jitna time free hai na utna time mere paas nahi hai. Barabar? Aur main aage dusri koi baat bhi karna nahi chahta hun. Mera concern hai ki mere ko refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir aap baat nahi karoge to main kya solution aapko provide karunga? Nahi nahi mere ko sir, mere ko solution chahiye. Hum aapko service de rahe hain. Meri baat suniye, meri baat suniye sir, mere ko koi solution nahi chahiye. Na hi to mere ko IndiaMART se dhandha chahiye. Barabar? IndiaMART ka naam sun, meri baat suniye sir, main kya bol raha hun. IndiaMART ke naam se main na pareshan ho chuka hun. Sab log hai na time pass karte hain. Mere ko wo nahi chahiye.
Customer: Mere ko koi baat nahi sunna hai, mere ko khali mera refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir exactly issue to bataiye mujhe hua kya hai?
Customer: Sir mere ko exactly sir aap chhodo sab baatein hai na mere paas itna time nahi hai main har ek aadmi ko.
Executive: Main service provider industry hun sir, maine aapse teen saal ka package continue karwaya hai, main teen saal ki aapko service dene ke liye yahan par responsible hun sir.
Customer: Sir main wahi bol raha hun na sir aap main hai na mere paas itna aap time pass karne ke liye aapke paas time hai na sir utna mere paas nahi hai.
Executive: Main time pass ki baat nahi kar raha hun sir, main aapko solution pe hi work kar raha hun.
Customer: Aapka sir har ek banda hai na time pass ke liye hi hai sir. To filhal mere paas itna time nahi hai main aapke sath time pass.
Executive: Aap mujhe bataiye sahi dekho ek baat batao online promotion mein online promotion mein IndiaMART.
Customer: Mere ko sir online just mere sir chhodo sir aap mera koi company nahi hai aur mere paas jo hai na mere mere paas itna talent hai main apna dhandha kar lunga.
Executive: Sir please please ek bari ek bari aaram se baat.
Customer: Mere ko sir ek minute bhi abhi mere paas time nahi hai sir mere ko hai na.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko ek cheez bata deta hun.
Customer: Sir aise sir refund hamare paas policy.
Executive: Meri baat suniye.
Customer: Aap IndiaMART ki policy chhodhiye.
Executive: Sir aapki policy ko chhodo meri baat suno aapki policy hai na aap mere ko mat samjhao mere ko already aage bhi hai na ye dedh saal pehle proof diya hai ki aapne refund kiya aisa. Aap policy mere ko mat samjhao maine already proof diya hai.
Executive: Sir kyunki main aapse teen saal ka package le raha hun sir, main teen saal ka aapko service deta hun sir.
Customer: Sir mere paas refund ka to kuch bhi nahi hai sir aap continue karne se pehle hi aapko clear hota hai ki main kya service dunga sir.
Executive: Main aapko promotion de raha hun sir, aap mujhe usi pe investment kar rahe hain teen saal se sir.
Customer: Mere ko sir agar aapko service mein problem hai.
Executive: Service main theek karke deta hun bataiye kya concern hai to aap mujhse wo to discuss kariye sir.
Customer: Sir aap abhi teen saal ka package pura hone ko aaya tabhi aapko kya concern hai wo bata rahe ho. Itne saal se meri baat suno, mere ko aaj samjho, meri baat samjho sir. Main na itna matlab IndiaMART ka koi naam mere ko neend mein bhi leta hai na mere ko aisa lagta hai main ye aadmi ko uth ke pehle gaali de du do teen. Sir aisa kyun hai main itna main itna pareshan ho chuka hun IndiaMART ke naam se. Itna pareshan ho chuka hun. Kisi executive ne aapko kuch bola?
Executive: Sir hamari kisi executive ne aapko kuch bola?
Customer: Executive aapke sab hai na ek number ke bakwas hai aadmi. Har ek 10 din mein manager change karte ho darshako ek baar har ek baar complaint bolte hain ki bhai hume service nahi chahiye hume refund chahiye. To wahi baat baat karke kya solution deta hun ye kar kar karte jao. To matlab nahi hai bhai. Barabar? Ek aadmi bol raha hai ek aadmi bol meri baat suno aap problem mat samjho sir abhi. Main aapko clear bol raha hun ki mere ko ye naam se bhi nafrat hone lag gayi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Barabar? IndiaMART ko mere ko neend mein mere sir main kya bol raha hun main IndiaMART ko neend mein sir main aapko batata hun. Ek minute meri meri meri baat suno aapko sir main clear and final words bol raha hun. Mere ko IndiaMART se na pura nafrat hai. Mere ko koi bolta hai na to bhi aap mere ko free mein bhi karke doge na next time se ki bhai Lalji bhai aap karo main aapko free mein.
Executive: Aap itne purani customer. Main IndiaMART ke bare mein aisa soch rahe hain sir.
Customer: Sir main IndiaMART sir mere liye hai na chuchi ke barabar hai abhi. Main kya bol raha hun.
Executive: Sir main main bas aapke liye promotion ka kaam karta hun.
Customer: Mere ko sir mere ko koi promotion nahi chahiye. Meri baat suniye, meri baat suniye mere ko koi promotion nahi chahiye mere ko khali mera refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek cheez clear karta hun sir dekho main aapko package provide karta hun teen saal ka aapne mere se teen saal ka continue kiya tha main teen saal service dene ke liye responsible hun sir. Aapko service mein koi problem hai aap mere sath discuss kariye lead inquiries mein koi problem hai aap mujhe bataiye to sahi issue kya hai?
Customer: Service bas bas ye jo aap log time pass kar rahe ho na wo mere paas issue hai. Support time pe nahi kar rahe wo issue hai.
Executive: Experience bataiye sir kya business mil rahe hain sir aapko IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Experience matlab sir kya hai company chodu banati hai.
Executive: Ye experience hai mera.
Customer: Customer ne aapko review rating di hai sir IndiaMART pe aap profile to ek bari dekh lijiye.
Executive: Maharashtra ke customer ne aapko review rating di hai sir IndiaMART pe aap profile to ek bari dekh lijiye.
Customer: Wo wo wo sab chhodo customer ko wo customer bhi meri tarah hai.
Executive: Business nahi ho raha agar aap business nahi ho raha sir aapko?
Customer: Sir main aapko kya bol raha hun mere liye IndiaMART ek gaali ke saman ho gaya hai. Main barabar IndiaMART ko mere ko koi bolta hai na mere ko gaali dene ke alawa aur koi sujhta hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho main ek online promotion company hun sir.
Customer: Main sir aapka jo bhi company hai meri baat sune aapka jo bhi company hai mere ko ek hi mera concern hai mere ko mera refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir I am really sorry sir dekho hamare paas refund nahi hai kyunki main aapko service provide kar raha hun service mein main aapko inquiries aapke sath de raha hun. Aapne jo bhi bol raha hun na sir aapko aapne jo bhi mujhe investment kari hai sir main us cheez ko complete kar raha hun sir. Aapko agar usme koi problem hai.
Customer: Kitne ghanta bhar ke doge sir mere ko wo batao.
Executive: Aap bataiye koi kami lag rahi hai aap mujhe bataiye aapko koi kami lag rahi hai aap mujhe bataiye aapko koi kami lag rahi hai aap mujhe bataiye aapko itna time se complaint kar rahe hain uska solution kyun nahi aa raha hai wo bataiye.
Customer: Complaint sir aap mujhe complaint bataiye na kis cheez ki problem hai.
Executive: Yahi complaint hai mera ki mere ko refund chahiye urgent ke liye mere ko proof bhi manga tha.
Executive: Sir refund to hai hi nahi sir hum aapko service provide karte hain lead inquiries hum la ke de rahe hain wahi hum us cheez pe hi kaam kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Sir aap aap bol rahe ho ki mere paas refund nahi hai main aapko proof du aapka kaun si date ko ye karwaya tha aur kaun si date ko refund kiya tha wo sab mere paas proof hai.
Executive: Sir par aap IndiaMART pe hamare paas hai nahi na main aapko agar aap ek baat bataiye IndiaMART aapne fir mere sath continue kyun kiya tha sir agar aap mujhse bar bar refund ki baat kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Aapne mere sath IndiaMART continue kyun kiya tha agar aap mere se bar bar refund ki baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Bar bar nahi sir ye jo teen saal ka kiya na uske bhai tum pehle hai na baat samjho uske baad baat karo ye jo tumhara teen saal ka package hua hai na uske baad hi maine refund ke liye bola hai. Barabar? Continue kyun kiya kyun nahi kiya wo mere ko mat samjhao.
Executive: To aap mujhe bataiye sir problem kya aa rahi hai sir? Aapko solution chahiye na agar main service nahi de pa raha aap mujhe tab bataiye sir. Main aapko customer la ke de raha hun inquiries de raha hun sir.
Customer: Tumhara kaam nahi hai customer la ke dene ka. Barabar? Tum log customer ko khali chutiya banane ka dhandha karo. Sir main itne logo ko promote kar raha hun IndiaMART pe itne sari company ko promotion kar rahe hain.
Executive: Kaunsa promote kar rahe ho? Jo promote aap mere ko char reference doge.
Customer: Aapko kya nahi mil raha mujhe batao. Aapko kya nahi mil raha IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Mere ko hai na sukoon nahi mil raha.
Executive: To sir kya chahte hain jo main aapko nahi de raha sir sukoon kis term mein nahi mil raha sir kya kya hai?
Customer: Mere ko paisa chahiye mere ko mera paisa chahiye.
Executive: Sir refund nahi hai sir aap refund ke alawa mujhe bataiye na koi kaam karna hai to mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Aapko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund.

- Customer is not satisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Customer feels IndiaMART is wasting his time.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to resolve service-related issues.

- Executive asked the customer to specify the issues.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, customer service, business leads, promotion
